CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Alkylation of the thiophene ring was carried out by Kumada coupling , yielding 3-alkylthiophene as a colorless oil or a white solid ( 6-9 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| thiophene ring |
| 3-alkylthiophene |
| colorless oil or a white solid |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are "thiophene ring", "3-alkylthiophene", and "colorless oil or a white solid". These entities are materials that are either being acted upon or produced during the alkylation process.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| thiophene ring |
| 3-alkylthiophene |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are "thiophene ring" and "3-alkylthiophene". These entities are materials that are either being acted upon or produced during the alkylation process.

The entity "colorless oil or a white solid" is not a specific material name, but rather a description of the physical appearance of the product. Therefore, it is not a valid "Material Name" entity.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Alkylation of the thiophene ring was carried out by Kumada coupling , yielding 3-alkylthiophene as a colorless oil or a white solid ( 6-9 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Alkylation |
| thiophene ring |
| Kumada coupling |
| 3-alkylthiophene |
| colorless oil or a white solid |

In this paragraph, the "Property Name" entities refer to the various chemical and physical properties or processes mentioned. These entities are: alkylation, thiophene ring, Kumada coupling, 3-alkylthiophene, and colorless oil or a white solid. Alkylation is a chemical process, thiophene ring is a chemical compound, Kumada coupling is a chemical reaction, 3-alkylthiophene is a chemical compound, and colorless oil or a white solid refers to the physical state of the product.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| colorless oil or a white solid |

In this paragraph, the only entity that clearly refers to a "Material Property" is "colorless oil or a white solid". This refers to the physical state or appearance of the material produced by the alkylation of the thiophene ring via Kumada coupling. The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, such as alkylation, thiophene ring, Kumada coupling, and 3-alkylthiophene, are either chemical processes or chemical compounds, and do not clearly refer to material properties.
